compliant.section: 二、資料的蒐集與使用方式
compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject

compliant.section: 二、資料的蒐集與使用方式
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data (specifically, purpose limitation)

compliant.section: 二、資料的蒐集與使用方式
compliant.legal provisions: Transparent information, communication and modalities for the exercise of the rights of the data subject

non_compliant.section: 二、資料的蒐集與使用方式
non_compliant.amend: The policy should state the legal basis for processing personal data, such as consent, contract performance, legal obligation, etc.

non_compliant.section: 二、資料的蒐集與使用方式
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right of access by the data subject
non_compliant.amend: The policy should explicitly state the rights of individuals to access their data.

non_compliant.section: 二、資料的蒐集與使用方式
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to rectification, Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten'), Right to restriction of processing
non_compliant.amend: The policy should explicitly state the rights of individuals to rectify, erase, or restrict processing of their data.

non_compliant.section: 二、資料的蒐集與使用方式
non_compliant.amend: The policy should explicitly state the right of individuals to object to the processing of their personal data.

non_compliant.section: 二、資料的蒐集與使用方式
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: While the policy mentions data collection for interactive services, it lacks details about data retention periods, the right to withdraw consent, and the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority.

non_compliant.section: 二、資料的蒐集與使用方式
non_compliant.amend: The policy should explicitly state the right of individuals to data portability, where applicable.
